title: Italian soccer pauses as Pope Francis dies at 88
content: Monday's Serie A fixtures have been postponed following the death of Pope Francis, the Italian league has announced.

title: Butler's poise helps Dubs win Game 1 out of '1997'
content: In his first playoff game with the Warriors, Jimmy Butler delivered 25 points, 7 rebounds, 6 assists and 5 steals Sunday night to give the Warriors a 1-0 lead over the Rockets in their first-round playoff series.

title: Sources: UGA lands transfer trio, including top LB
content: A trio of transfers -- Army outside linebacker Elo Modozie, Illinois running back Josh McCray and Miami defensive lineman Josh Horton -- have signed with Georgia, sources told ESPN.

title: Yanks' Fried loses no-hit bid after scorer's change
content: New York Yankees veteran left-hander Max Fried lost a no-hit bid in Sunday's 4-0 victory over the Tampa Bay Rays just as the bottom of the eighth inning was about to start when the official scorer changed a sixth-inning call to a hit from an error.

title: NBA unveils award finalists for 2024-25 season
content: The NBA unveiled the three finalists for each of its seven major individual awards for the 2024-25 regular season Sunday night.

title: Cavs ride Jerome heater to Game 1 win vs. Heat
content: Cavaliers sparkplug Ty Jerome went off in Game 1 against the Heat, scoring or assisting on 24 consecutive points to close out the victory in the fourth.

title: Top portal QB Iamaleava transferring to UCLA
content: Tennessee quarterback Nico Iamaleava officially announced his transfer to UCLA via a social media post Sunday, citing an "incredibly difficult" decision.

title: Arraez exits hospital, rejoins Padres after win
content: San Diego designated hitter Luis Arraez returned to the stadium postgame after he was taken to a hospital following a collision with Mauricio Dubon on a play at first base in the first inning of the Padres' 3-2 win over the Houston Astros on Sunday night.

title: Stanley Cup playoffs daily: Previewing Monday's four-game slate
content: Two series begin, while it's Game 2 for Blues-Jets and Stars-Avs. Here are the key storylines in each.

content: After earning Penn State's famed No. 11 jersey, how has Abdul Carter positioned himself to be a top-5 pick?

title: NBA Rank, playoffs edition: The 50 most impactful players for 2025
content: From MVP hopefuls to postseason heroes, we're counting down the top 50 players who will decide the 2025 playoffs.

title: How Mikko Rantanen impacts the Stars' Stanley Cup hopes -- in 2025 and well beyond
content: Long a draft-and-develop team, the trade signaled a philosophical shift, with aftershocks still to come.

title: WrestleMania 41 Night 2 results: Cena makes history, beats Rhodes for WWE Undisputed title
content: The next chapter of John Cena's farewell tour kicks off with the WWE Universal championship around his waist. Here are the best moments from WrestleMania 41 Night 2.

title: A win away from the title, Liverpool coronation begins at Leicester
content: Liverpool's fans were already celebrating the title in the win at Leicester. The team itself will soon join in.

title: Leicester relegated from PL after loss to Liverpool
content: Leicester City have been condemned to an immediate return to the Championship after their relegation from the Premier League was confirmed with a defeat to Liverpool on Sunday.

title: TAA silent on Madrid links after 'special' winner
content: Liverpool defender Trent Alexander-Arnold remained tight-lipped on his future at Anfield amid continued links to Real Madrid, although he added that Sunday's winner over Leicester City would always be "special."

title: Amorim defends Højlund despite scoring woes
content: Ruben Amorim has insisted that Rasmus Højlund is not solely to blame for Manchester United's problems scoring while also urging the rest of the team to take responsibility in front of goal.

title: Valverde 'the key' as Madrid 'react' to UCL exit
content: Carlo Ancelotti praised Federico Valverde as "the key" after the midfielder's 93rd-minute goal gave Real Madrid a dramatic 1-0 win over Athletic Club on Sunday to react to their Champions League exit in midweek.

title: Barcelona rout Chelsea in first leg of UWCL semis
content: Holders Barcelona put themselves in the driving seat with a resounding 4-1 over Chelsea in the first leg of their women's Champions League semifinal on Sunday, with substitute Claudia Pina netting twice.

title: Lewandowski (hamstring) in doubt for UCL semis
content: Barcelona striker Robert Lewandowski is a major doubt for the Copa del Rey final and the Champions League semifinal, sources told ESPN after the team confirmed he has a hamstring injury.

title: St. Pauli draw leaves Leverkusen defence near end
content: Reigning champions Bayer Leverkusen slipped up with a 1-1 draw at St Pauli on Sunday to drop eight points behind leaders Bayern Munich as their slim hopes of defending the Bundesliga title were all but ended.

title: Arteta says Saka 'in pain' but quashes injury fears
content: Arsenal's Mikel Arteta said Bukayo Saka was left in pain after suffering a knock in the 4-0 win at Ipswich, although he ruled out any chance of a "serious" injury.

title: Outfought and outclassed by Barcelona, Chelsea look cooked in Champions League semi
content: Chelsea will need to produce the best performance in their 33-year history to overturn a 4-1 defeat to Barcelona in the Women's Champions League.

title: Ingrid Lindblad wins LA Championship in third start
content: Ingrid Lindblad won the JM Eagle LA Championship on Sunday in her third start as an LPGA Tour member.

title: How Piastri-Verstappen incident led to McLaren's Saudi win
content: After nearly colliding on Lap 1 Max Verstappen was forced to yield to eventual Saudi GP winner Oscar Piastri.

title: The postseason is here: Stanley Cup cases, X factors, bold predictions for all 16 teams
content: The postseason Thunderdome is about to open its gate. Which team will emerge as the 2025 Stanley Cup champion?

title: Stanley Cup Playoffs Central: Bracket, schedule, scores, news
content: From the first round all the way through the Stanley Cup Final, ESPN has you covered this NHL postseason.

title: What's on the masks of 2025 Stanley Cup playoff goalies? Our guide to all 16 teams
content: The 2025 Stanley Cup playoffs are underway and it's the drip in goal that could potentially steal the show.

title: OU conquers '24 demons, reclaims gymnastics title
content: Fueled by last season's stunning early exit, Oklahoma reclaimed its place atop the college gymnastics world.

title: KC Current, Washington Spirit leapfrog Orlando Pride at the top
content: Orlando's first defeat of 2025 cost the Pride, who fell behind KC and Washington in ESPN's NWSL Power Rankings.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea's Garnacho chase gets crowded
content: A host of clubs are ready to rival Chelsea for Alejandro Garnacho's signature. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: The long fight ahead for boxing's Heather Hardy
content: The former boxing champ uses her brain injury to call for systemic changes to improve the health and education of fighters.

title: District Collector outlines multi-crore development plans for Chirala constituency
content: He announced that ₹10 crore would be utilized under the Jal Jeevan Mission to address Chirala’s drinking water issue permanently

title: Indian Air Force chopper makes emergency landing in Gujarat's Jamnagar
content: IAF helicopter makes emergency landing near dam in Gujarat, no injuries reported, investigation underway

title: ‘We are alleged of encroaching upon parliamentary, executive functions’: Justice Gavai
content: “As it is, we are now criticised that we are interfering with the executive’s function, the legislative functions,” Justice Gavai said while hearing a plea seeking direction to the Centre to prohibit streaming of sexually explicit and pornographic content on OTT and social media platforms

title: Compensation cheques distributed for Brodipet ROB expansion; Union Minister urges cooperation for timely completion
content: The existing bridge is in a dilapidated condition and cannot handle the growing traffic demands of Guntur city. This project is essential for the city’s development, Union Minister Pemmasani said

title: T.N. Law Minister declines request for legislation to abolish superstitions
content: Speaking in the Assembly, the Minister contended that such a law would not “stop one belief or protect another.”

title: Sivagiri Madhom recalls Pope Francis’ words on Sree Narayana Guru
content: Condoling the Pope’s demise, Sivagiri Madhom president Swami Sathchidananda remembers Pope Francis as a spiritual leader who stood unmatched in popularity and in his ability to bring people together

title: Five Indian Cardinals to take part in Cardinals conclave to decide the next Pope
content: There are currently six Cardinals from India as of February 23, 2025; five are eligible to vote in the Conclave

title: T.N. IT Department allocated less funds, reiterates Palanivel Thiaga Rajan
content: He also termed it “unusual” that TIDEL parks and neo TIDEL parks were functioning under the Industries Department, and not the IT Department

title: Supreme Court says probe against Ranveer Allahbadia complete; sets April 28 to hear plea for passport return
content: A Bench of Justices Surya Kant and N. Kotiswar Singh said it would consider Ranveer Allahbadia's plea on April 28

title: Congress condoles Pope Francis’ demise; pontiff left behind valuable legacy, says Kharge
content: Congress MP and Leader of Opposition in the Lok Sabha, Rahul Gandhi, also condoled the passing of Pope Francis, whom he decribed as a ‘global voice of compassion, justice, and peace’

title: Mohiniyattam is a complete art form, says Japanese artiste Hiromi Maruhashi
content: Hiromi Maruhashi has been coming to Kerala every year to keep her connect with Mohiniyattam. She recently attended a workshop led by danseuse Neena Prasad

title: Rahul Gandhi requests Telangana CM to enact Rohith Vemula Act
content: It is a shame that even today, millions of students from Dalit, Adivasi and OBC communities have to face such brutal discrimination in our educational system: Rahul Gandhi in a letter to Telangana CM

title: Wife and daughter booked for murder of former DGP Om Prakash in Bengaluru
content: On April 21 morning, police brought Kriti to the H. S. R. Layout police station following a complaint by her brother Karthikesh implicating both his mother and sister

title: Kerala CM Pinarayi Vijayan condoles passing of Pope Francis
content: In a condolence message, Pinarayi Vijayan says Pope Francis’ papacy was characterised by significant outreach to marginalised communities, interfaith dialogue, and a critical stance on global capitalism

title: Educate, organise and agitate should be our mantra, says Karnataka CM
content: He said that the lives of leaders like Dr. Ambedkar show us that education can eliminate slavery and lead a life of self-respect

title: Karnataka CET 2025: One more incident related to ‘sacred thread’ in Sagar, police register case
content: According to his complaint, registered on April 19, during the physical examination of candidates, the staff told him to remove his ‘sacred thread’

title: Congress leader Deepa Dasmunshi says party’s stand on Central agency actions only based on merit of case
content: Deepa Dasmunshi says action against Congress leaders is aimed at diverting public’s attention from key issues including unemployment, economic crisis, social disorder and foreign policy challenges

title: Hopes on to conclude trade pact with U.S. this year: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman
content: Nirmala Sitharaman is on a five-day trip to the U.S., where she will join the spring meetings of the International Monetary Fund, World Bank, and the meeting of G20 Finance Ministers and Central Bank governors

title: Policies our govt is working on will shape future of next 1,000 years: PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi outlines policies shaping India’s future for next 1,000 years at Civil Services Day event

title: Three deaths in Tiruchi’s Woraiyur not due to water contamination, says Minister in Assembly
content: Minister K.N. Nehru further contended that the distribution of buttermilk and cold drinks during a recent festival in nearby areas could have caused several people to fall ill

title: Kerala CM Pinarayi Vijayan blames Centre for ‘neglect’, highlights State’s resilience
content: CM inaugurates LDF government’s fourth anniversary celebrations and Ente Keralam exhibition and marketing fair in Kasaragod

title: Landslide-hit Jammu-Srinagar NH remains closed, restoration work may take six days
content: Hundreds of vehicles were left stranded on the strategic 250-kilometre highway — the only all-weather road linking Kashmir with the rest of the country — on Sunday (April 20, 2025)

title: Allahabad HC drops case against man, says liking post on social media different from sharing it
content: From the material on record, the court found that Mr. Khan had merely liked a message published by another person and no offence was made out against him.

title: Election Commission is compromised: Rahul Gandhi in U.S.
content: Rahul Gandhi, at event in Boston, said more people voted in the Maharashtra Assembly elections than there are adults in the State

title: Shine Tom Chacko’s hotel escape during raid under scrutiny; Kochi police doubt actor’s explanation
content: The actor told the police that he fled as he feared for his life since he mistook police personnel for goons

title: TASMAC Vs ED case: Madras High Court to deliver verdict on April 23
content: Justices S.M. Subramaniam and K. Rajasekar reserve their verdict after the conclusion of elaborate arguments advanced by a battery of senior counsel

title: Four pilgrims from Madhya Pradesh killed, three injured in accident near Rajasthan's Chittorgarh
content: The accident occurred near the Jaliya checkpost in Nimbahera. The SUV ferrying the devotees allegedly hit a divider on the road, veered onto the wrong side and crashed into a truck

title: J.D. Vance in Delhi: What’s on U.S. Vice President’s India agenda?
content: U.S. Vice President J.D. Vance is on a four-day visit to India, blending diplomacy with personal heritage. What’s on his agenda? Read here.

title: India to generate 8 million jobs per year for next 10-12 years: Chief Economic Advisor Anantha Nageswaran
content: The CEA outlined that artificial intelligence, technology, and robotics are challenges that some of the developed countries of today do not have to face in their developmental journey

title: Ex-DGP murder case: Detailed investigation will bring out truth, says Home Minister
content: The retired IPS officer was found dead in a pool of blood in his HSR Layout residence in Bengaluru on Sunday (April 20, 2025) afternoon

title: 2 shot dead, 5 injured as argument over parking at wedding turns violent in Bihar
content: A heated argument between two groups over parking vehicles at a wedding escalated, following which one side opened fire on the other

title: Eight Maoists killed in Jharkhand encounter
content: The exchange of fire, which started around 5.30 am in Lugu Hills of the Lalpania area of the district, is still going on, officials said.

title: There was plan to project Adityanath as PM candidate during Maha Kumbh: Akhilesh
content: "They wanted to turn it into a political Kumbh, not a religious one. It was not a Kumbh for devotees, but for political purposes,” said Mr. Yadav

title: Madras High Court grants bail to drug smuggling accused Jaffer Sadiq in PMLA case
content: Justice Sunder Mohan follows the orders passed by the Supreme Court while granting bail to former Delhi Deputy Chief Minister Manish Sisodia

title: Flash floods in Jammu & Kashmir's Ramban: Volunteers defied fear to reach out to victims
content: Deputy Commissioner Baseer-ul-Haq Chaudhary is closely monitoring the ongoing operations in the affected areas, where educational institutions will remain closed on April 21, 2025

title: Sivaji Ganesan’s bungalow row: Madras High Court lifts attachment order
content: Justice Abdul Quddhose lifts the attachment pursuant to an application filed by actor Prabhu stating that he was now the sole owner of the property

title: Disha Patani's sister rescues injured infant from abandoned building in U.P.'s Bareilly
content: The child was found near Disha's Bareilly residence, where Kushboo Patani stays with her father, retired police circle officer Jagdish Patani

title: U.P. engineer ends life accusing wife of harassment
content: Brother of the deceased said the family received a video from Mohit before he allegedly took his own life in which he accused his wife and in-laws of mentally harassing him over property issues and threatening to kill him

title: After Australia’s visa crackdown on Indians, MEA says visa matters are ‘sovereign prerogatives’
content: Australia has launched a visa crackdown on Indians, especially from five states, including Punjab, Haryana, Gujarat, UP and Bihar.

title: Unemployed JACs, teacher association thank Naidu for fulfilling promise on Mega DSC
content: Unemployed JAC State convener Shaik Siddiq thanked the Chief Minister for fulfilling his promise on Mega DSC. He said the credit for filling nearly 80% of teacher posts even in the united Andhra Pradesh goes to Mr. Naidu.

title: Cautious narrative, sobering outlook: Top IT companies’ results trail expectations amid tariff woes
content: India's top-rung IT services companies TCS, Infosys and Wipro disappointed with their March quarter and full year FY25 scorecards on multiple counts

title: Murshidabad violence: Sukanta Majumdar targets Mamata, says she made West Bengal ‘Bangladesh version lite’
content: MEA condemned the incident in Bangladesh and urged the interim Government in Bangladesh to ensure protection for all minorities

title: Jailed Punjab MP Amritpal's father slams Mann Government for extending his son's detention under NSA
content: Tarsem Singh criticises Punjab Government for extending Amritpal’s detention under NSA, calling it a threat to democracy.

title: All schools in Kashmir to remain shut on April 21 amid heavy rains
content: Kashmir valley has been lashed by heavy rains over the past 48 hours even as the weather office has forecast more precipitation over the next 24 hours.

title: J.D. Vance in India LIVE: U.S. Vice President to visit Amber Fort in Jaipur, and Agra
content: The U.S. Vice President will meet PM Modi on Monday evening and deliver an address on Tuesday in Jaipur, where he is likely to make a policy statement on India-U.S. ties

title: Adding community to the equation of elderly care
content: By 2050, the elderly population, for the first time, is expected to exceed the population aged 0-15. This underscores the importance of turning the healthcare spotlight on the elderly, with community participation in focus, say experts

title: Concern over Bangladesh embankment along river on Tripura border
content: A high-level team visited southern Tripura on Sunday to assess the flood protection measures on the Indian side

title: AITUC seeks probe into ‘irregularities’ at Rayachoti sub-registrar office
content: Sambashiva alleged that properties under YSR Kadapa district were being registered at the Rayachoti sub-registrar office in Annamayya district and that bribes were being collected for this

title: Maharashtra language panel rejects govt. decision to make Hindi compulsory in schools
content: In a letter to Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis, the panel has urged the government to scrap the order

title: Physicist and teacher A.P. Balachandran passes away
content: He was the Joel Dorman Steele emeritus professor at Syracuse University and an internationally recognised theoretical physicist

title: New check dam, restored water channel across Palar near Katpadi inaugurated
content: According to the WRD officials, the entire channel has been desilted to a distance of 12.7 km and a depth of four metres, and widened up to three metres; the check dam has been built at ₹9.7 crore

title: MP, TDP leaders celebrate Naidu’s birthday in Vijayawada
content: People recognised the abilities of Chandrababu Naidu, and gave the TDP-Jana Sena Party-BJP alliance a resounding victory in the 2024 elections, says Vijayawada MP Kesineni Sivanath

title: Chief Minister cancels programme over unauthorised nature of venue
content: Meanwhile, the Samithi activists staged a protest in front of the three gates of the building, saying that they shall not allow vehicles to be parked in the vast ground beside the building, which, they claimed, was a landfill on the Kottooli wetlands, a proposed Ramsar site.

title: Team from T.N. participates in kite festival in Weifang, China
content: The event, recognised as the world’s prestigious kite festival, takes place in Weifang, Shandong Province, which is renowned as the ‘Kite Capital of the World’

title: Police flummoxed by loose ends in shootout on Rikki Rai
content: The hitman has shot at the car from the driver’s side, knowing pretty well it will not directly hit Rikki Rai, a senior official pointed out

title: Is nitrogen, a building block of life, a latent time-bomb?
content: Nitrous oxide is the third most abundant of the greenhouse gases; it accentuates the greenhouse effect in the same way as carbon dioxide does by capturing re-radiated infrared radiation from the Earth’s surface and warming the troposphere; urgent action on it is critical to achieving climate goals

title: Former DGP Om Prakash’s wife called friend and claimed she killed him
content: A few days ago, Pallavi posted a series of messages on a WhatsApp group, claiming Om Prakash was trying to kill her and was drugging her daughter as well

title: Diving into SC’s verdict on Governors
content: The Supreme Court’s recent judgment in the Tamil Nadu Government’s suit against its Governor has done more than clear some Bills for the one State — it has set the tone for governments and Governors in a similar position in several other States

title: Doctor, hospital staffer sacked for dragging and assaulting a 77-year-old man in Madhya Pradesh government hospital
content: The man was accompanying his 70-year-old wife, a patient; hospital superintendent, who initially claimed the victim was “cutting the queue”, also suspended; FIR filed with charges of criminal intimidation

title: Arts and science colleges in Tamil Nadu enter the arena of entrepreneurism
content: With the spread of start-up culture, colleges are improving their incubation cells and forging partnerships with the key players in the entrepreneurial ecosystem. As a result, more students pursuing arts and science courses are venturing into entrepreneurship

title: Historic representation of women in Civil Services: Union Minister Jitendra Singh
content: The Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) praises record women’s representation in IAS batch, with 74 women officers make up 41% of the 2023 batch of the Indian Administrative Service

title: Staff Selection Commission implements Aadhaar-based authentication for its recruitment exams
content: Aadhaar authentication aims to prevent identity fraud and ensure the integrity of the recruitment process for government jobs

title: Son of murdered ex-Karnataka DGP reveals chilling threats by mother, sister
content: Former Karnataka DGP Om Prakash was allegedly murdered by his wife Pallavi and daughter Kriti at their HSR Layout home. His son Kartikesh filed a complaint, citing prior threats. Om Prakash was found with fatal injuries. Both accused have been arrested, and further investigation is ongoing to uncover the motive.

title: Pope Francis dies: World leaders mourn passing away of 'beacon of hope'
content: Pope Francis, the first Jesuit and non-European pontiff in over 1,200 years, passed away on Easter Monday at the age of 88. His papacy, which began in 2013, was defined by his focus on mercy, inclusiveness, and environmental concerns. World leaders are mourning the loss of a figure who championed justice and compassion, while the Vatican prepares for the election of a new pope.

title: 'Hates Hindus': BJP flays CM Mamata for not visiting Murshidabad
content: The BJP has strongly criticised West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee for her absence from violence-affected Murshidabad, alleging anti-Hindu bias. BJP MP Sambit Patra claimed Banerjee would have reacted differently if Muslims were victims. The party also accused CPI (M) of disowning deceased Hindu workers, highlighting the politicization of the Murshidabad clashes following protests against the Waqf (Amendment) Act.

title: 'Kohli shows why he's a legend': Sehwag in awe of chase master
content: Virat Kohli's unbeaten 73 guided Royal Challengers Bengaluru to a crucial victory over Punjab Kings. Kohli anchored the innings with Devdutt Padikkal, who scored 61, forming a match-defining partnership. Virender Sehwag praised Kohli's ability to finish games under pressure, highlighting his match-winning temperament and consistency in chases, making him a true legend.

title: Infosys HR’s email to 240 trainees who failed the test: As you …
content: Infosys recently terminated 240 entry-level employees after they failed to clear internal assessment tests, following a similar layoff of over 300 trainees in February. Despite additional preparation and multiple attempts, these System Engineers and Digital Specialist Engineers did not meet the required standards.

title: With Pope Francis gone, who are 4 Indian Cardinals to vote for his successor?
content: Following Pope Francis's death at 88, the Vatican is observing the Novendiale, a nine-day mourning period. Preparations are underway for the Papal Conclave, where 135 cardinals will elect the new Pope. Among them, four hail from India: Cardinals Filipe Neri Ferrao, Baselios Cleemis, Anthony Poola, and George Jacob Koovakad.

title: Indian Air Force officer, wife attacked by biker in Bengaluru road rage
content: In Bengaluru, an Indian Air Force officer, Wing Commander Aditya Bose, and his wife, Squadron Leader Madhumita, were allegedly assaulted on Sunday evening. According to reports, a biker tailed their car, verbally abused them, and attacked Wing Commander Bose with a key, causing a head injury. The biker further threw a stone, hitting Bose again.

title: 'Death of the salaried': CEO Mukherjea's big warning on white collar jobs
content: Investment strategist Saurabh Mukherjea warns of a decline in white-collar employment in India due to automation and AI. He suggests that traditional salaried jobs are becoming unsustainable, particularly in sectors like IT and finance. Mukherjea advocates for entrepreneurship, supported by India's digital infrastructure, as a viable alternative for the educated workforce.

title: Intensity of Zepto's culture isn’t for ...: says CEO on work-life balance
content: Zepto's CEO, Aadit Palicha, has softened his stance on workplace intensity after facing criticism. He now calls his earlier remarks about work-life balance a "stupid idea." This comes after allegations of a toxic work culture at Zepto, including long hours and late-night meetings.

title: IPL 2025: Crorepatis who are yet to get off the mark
content: Several high-priced players in IPL 2025 are yet to debut despite hefty price tags. Mayank Yadav (LSG), T Natarajan (DC), Jacob Bethell (RCB), Gerald Coetzee (GT), and Rahmanullah Gurbaz (KKR) were signed for substantial amounts but haven't featured due to team dynamics, fitness, or strong performances from existing players. Their potential inclusion could impact team strategies as the tournament progresses.

title: 'Hateful politics': Ex-CEC hits back at BJP's Dubey
content: Former Chief Election Commissioner S Y Quraishi has strongly condemned BJP MP Nishikant Dubey's communal remarks, denouncing it as an attempt to exploit religion for divisive politics. Quraishi defended his tenure and commitment to secularism, emphasizing that individuals should be valued for their contributions, not their religious identity.

title: George Soros' son wishes Happy Easter, Elon Musk responds: You ...
content: A brief exchange on X between Alex Soros and Elon Musk has sparked intrigue, given their families' history of public disagreements. It began when Alex Soros shared Easter greetings, to which Musk responded with, “Um … you too”.

title: 'We’re accused of encroaching on Parliament, executive functions': SC
content: The Supreme Court addressed concerns about potentially overstepping its constitutional boundaries while hearing a petition concerning recent violence in West Bengal related to protests against the Waqf Amendment Act. Justice Gavai's bench acknowledged allegations of encroaching on parliamentary and executive functions. Advocate Vishnu Shankar Jain requested directions to the Centre under Article 355, suggesting President's Rule due to the unrest.

title: Neeraj Chopra's next big throw: A global event with his name on it
content: Neeraj Chopra, the celebrated Indian javelin star, is set to launch the inaugural Neeraj Chopra Classic (NC Classic) on May 24 in Bengaluru. This World Athletics Category A event marks his contribution to Indian athletics, featuring international stars like Anderson Peters and Thomas Rohler. Chopra also extended an invitation to Pakistani Olympic champion Arshad Nadeem, but is yet to be confirmed.

title: Pope Francis passes away: What was the cause of his death?
content: Pope Francis, the first Latin American pontiff, passed away at the age of 88 on April 21 after a prolonged battle with respiratory illnesses and kidney failure. The head of the Catholic Church, who had served since 2013, was hospitalized multiple times for a respiratory tract infection that developed into double pneumonia.

title: Serie A postpones matches as Italian football mourns Pope Francis’ death
content: Following the death of Pope Francis at 88, Serie A has postponed four matches scheduled for Monday, including Torino vs. Udinese and Lazio vs. Genoa. The Italian football federation (FIGC) has also delayed all professional and amateur games. The Pope, remembered as a football enthusiast, was described by the FIGC as an example of Christian charity.

title: 'Will be remembered as beacon of compassion': PM Modi condoles Pope Francis
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday mourned on the death of Pope Francis, describing the pontiff as a global symbol of "beacon of compassion, humility and spiritual courage". "I fondly recall my meetings with him and was greatly inspired by his commitment to inclusive and all-round development. His affection for the people of India will always be cherished. May his soul find eternal peace in God’s embrace," he said.

title: How oceans can help in reducing carbon dioxide
content: In UK, Project SeaCURE is pioneering technology to extract CO₂ directly from seawater, enhancing the ocean's natural carbon absorption. This initiative aims to combat climate change by capturing CO₂ before it escapes, using sustainable materials.

title: Pope Francis passes away: How a new pope will be chosen
content: Pope Francis, at the age of 88, passed away at 7:35 am, as announced by the Vatican. Cardinal Kevin Farrell confirmed his passing, noting his dedication to the Church and its vulnerable members. The College of Cardinals, consisting of 115 eligible members, will convene in Rome for a secret conclave to elect his successor, following centuries-old traditions.

title: Pope Francis' early life, family, and remarkable journey to priesthood
content: Pope Francis passed away on April 21, 2025, at the age of 88, as announced by Vatican News. Before becoming Pope, Jorge Mario Bergoglio, born in Argentina, worked various jobs, including a nightclub bouncer.

title: India in a good spot, China in big trouble: Mark Mobius
content: Veteran investor Mark Mobius suggests India can capitalize on the global supply chain shift from China, but must act swiftly. He urges India to reduce bureaucratic hurdles to attract investment and streamline trade processes.

title: 'I have killed the monster': Wife of ex-Karnataka DGP detained for his murder
content: Former Karnataka DGP Om Prakash was allegedly murdered by his wife, Pallavi, at their Bengaluru residence. Pallavi is accused of attacking him with chilli powder and a knife following a heated argument. Their daughter, Kriti, is also being questioned. Police are investigating long-standing family tensions, including a property dispute and Pallavi's mental health, as potential motives.

title: Virat Kohli and Preity Zinta share heartwarming moment after RCB's victory
content: Following RCB's victory, Virat Kohli and Preity Zinta shared a delightful moment near the boundary, captured on camera. Their interaction, filled with smiles and laughter, showcased mutual respect. Despite Punjab Kings' loss, Zinta graciously congratulated Kohli on his match-winning innings of 73 not out.

title: 'You are a traitor': BJP hits back at Rahul Gandhi over his remarks on EC in US
content: The Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) strongly criticized Congress leader Rahul Gandhi for his remarks made in Boston, where he alleged that the Election Commission (EC) was "compromised." BJP MP Sambit Patra labeled Gandhi a "traitor," accusing him of disrespecting Indian democracy and the nation while abroad, especially during the US VP's India visit.

title: 'Everything is lost': Harrowing tales emerge from Delhi building collapse site
content: Hints of a potential reunion between estranged cousins Raj and Uddhav Thackeray's parties, MNS and Shiv Sena (UBT), have sparked internal debate. MNS's Sandeep Deshpande questioned Uddhav's past actions, while SS (UBT)'s Sanjay Raut downplayed Deshpande's concerns.

title: Pope Francis passes away: Who could be the next Pope?
content: Pope Francis passed away at 88, prompting discussions about his successor. The selection process involves 138 eligible cardinals under 80 years old voting in a secret conclave at the Sistine Chapel until a two-thirds majority is reached. Potential candidates include Cardinals Pietro Parolin, Peter Erdö, Luis Tagle, and Matteo Zuppi, among others, to lead the Catholic Church.

title: 'Congress must know its past': BJP shares video of Indira Gandhi amid Dubey row
content: Amidst controversy over Nishikant Dubey's criticism of the Supreme Court, BJP resurfaced an old video of Indira Gandhi questioning judicial overreach. Gandhi questioned a judge's competence to assess political dynamics, advocating for the primacy of democratic institutions. Dubey's remarks, criticizing the court's actions and questioning its authority, have sparked debate and drawn criticism.

title: Stock market today: BSE Sensex jumps over 1,000 points; top reasons for the rally
content: Stock market today: BSE Sensex and Nifty50, the Indian equity benchmark indices, rallied strongly in trade on Monday. While BSE Sensex went above 79,600 intraday, Nifty50 crossed 24,150.

title: Karnataka woman ends life after in-laws' taunts over dark complexion
content: Pooja Ayyanagoudar, a 24-year-old woman from Ballari, tragically ended her life after allegedly facing harassment from her mother-in-law and brother-in-law due to her complexion. The incident occurred in Betgeri-Gadag, just four months after her marriage to Amaresh. Police have arrested Shashikala and Veeranagouda following a complaint filed by Pooja's parents, and they are currently in judicial custody.

title: Randeep Hooda reveals how he lost 18 Kg in 28 days
content: Randeep Hooda, known for his dedication to roles, recently revealed his extreme 18-kilo weight loss in 28 days for 'Swatantrya Veer Savarkar.' He disclosed stopping eating and drinking for the climax scene, impacting his health. While advising against his methods, Hooda endorses fasting for weight loss and rejuvenation.

title: BCCI central contract: Shreyas, Ishan return; promotion for Pant
content: The BCCI has announced the annual player contracts for Team India for the 2024-25 season. Shreyas Iyer receives a Grade B contract, while Ishan Kishan is awarded a Grade C contract. Rishabh Pant has been promoted to Grade A, joining the list of contracted players across various grades, including A+, A, B, and C.

title: AAP steps back from Delhi mayor elections, urges BJP to take charge 'without excuses'
content: Aam Aadmi Party will not contest in the upcoming Delhi Mayor elections. This clears the path for Bharatiya Janata Party to take control of the Municipal Corporation of Delhi. Saurabh Bharadwaj says this allows BJP to govern without excuses. He accuses BJP of unethical power grabs since the MCD elections announcement.

title: Elon Musk’s Tesla eyes India to diversify its global supply chain
content: Tesla is in discussions with Micron and CG Semi to diversify its semiconductor supply chain, reducing reliance on China amidst geopolitical tensions and rising costs. These partnerships align with Tesla's broader strategy of engaging with Indian manufacturers.

title: 'EC is compromised': Rahul Gandhi rakes up voter fraud claims during US visit
content: Rahul Gandhi, while addressing the Indian diaspora in Boston, alleged that the Election Commission of India is compromised. He cited irregularities in the Maharashtra assembly elections, claiming a statistically impossible surge in voter turnout within a short period. The Election Commission refuted these claims, stating that the electoral rolls were updated with minimal contestation.

title: 'Team Huddle': Was Yemen war plan discussed with family by US defense secretary?
content: US Defence Secretary Hegseth faces scrutiny after sharing sensitive military details about a Yemen airstrike in a private Signal chat with his family and lawyer. This follows a prior incident where similar information was leaked, prompting a Pentagon investigation and internal turmoil. Concerns are mounting over the handling of classified materials and potential breaches of security protocols.

title: BCCI central contracts: Who has been promoted, who has been demoted?
content: The BCCI announced annual player contracts for Team India have been announced, with Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, Jasprit Bumrah, and Ravindra Jadeja retaining A+ status. Shreyas Iyer and Ishan Kishan received Grade B and Grade C contracts, respectively, after prior exclusion due to Ranji Trophy absence. Rishabh Pant was promoted to Grade A, while several new players secured Grade C contracts.

title: Wife, lover held for killing husband; body found in 2 pieces inside trolley bag
content: In Uttar Pradesh's Deoria, a woman, Raziya, murdered her husband, Naushad Ahmed, with her lover's help, dismembering his body and stuffing it in a trolley bag. The gruesome discovery was made by a farmer. Raziya confessed, citing her husband as an obstacle to her affair. Police are searching for the absconding paramour.

title: Isro achieves second docking with SpaDeX satellites
content: ISRO has achieved a second successful docking of its SpaDeX satellites, marking a significant advancement in space technology. Chairman V Narayanan hailed the operation as smooth, emphasizing its importance for future missions. Union Minister Jitendra Singh announced the docking, following the initial docking on January 16 and subsequent undocking on March 13.

title: Mahela's heartfelt praise to Rohit goes viral
content: Mumbai Indians celebrated a dominant victory over Chennai Super Kings, highlighted by a heartfelt post-match huddle. Coach Mahela Jayawardene praised the team's performance, acknowledging Kieron Pollard's pre-match request for something special. He lauded Rohit Sharma's unbeaten 76, calling him a 'maverick' and celebrating his comeback. The team's applause underscored the significance of Rohit's innings and his return to form.

title: Virat Kohli gifts a bat to Punjab Kings youngster
content: Virat Kohli, after leading Royal Challengers Bengaluru to a dominant victory against Punjab Kings, showcased his sportsmanship by gifting a bat to young Mumbai batter Musheer Khan. Kohli's unbeaten 73, along with Devdutt Padikkal's 61, secured the win, marking Kohli's 59th IPL half-century and surpassing David Warner for most 50+ scores.

title: MS Dhoni reflects on CSK's dismal IPL 2025
content: Chennai Super Kings suffered a crushing 9-wicket defeat against Mumbai Indians, exposing glaring weaknesses in their bowling and batting execution. Despite fifties from Jadeja and Dube, CSK's playoff hopes dwindle as they remain at the bottom of the table with only two wins.

title: Watch: MS Dhoni's animated argument with umpire goes viral
content: Following a crushing nine-wicket defeat to Mumbai Indians, a visibly upset MS Dhoni engaged in a heated discussion with the umpires. Dhoni admitted CSK's performance was subpar, citing a failure to capitalize on the middle overs and dropped catches.

title: IAF Chopper Makes Emergency Landing In Gujarat's Jamnagar
content: A helicopter of the Indian Air Force (IAF) made an emergency landing near a dam in Gujarat's Jamnagar district on Monday, police said.

title: Who Will Be Pope Francis' Successor? Focus Turns To Red-Robed Cardinals
content: With the death of Pope Francis, announced by the Vatican on Monday, Roman Catholics around the globe will start speculating on who among the red-robed cardinals will succeed him.

title: "Our Kids Loved It": JD Vance Visits Akshardham Temple With Family
content: US Vice President J D Vance, his Indian-origin wife Usha and their three children began their India trip on Monday with a visit to the sprawling Swaminarayan Akshardham Temple near the banks of the Yamuna.

title: "Home Detox With Ghee, Nimbu": Ex Top Cop's Wife Claimed He Poisoned Her
content: The wife of former Karnataka police chief Om Prakash, who has been detained after the retired officer was found brutally murdered at his Bengaluru home, suspected him of poisoning her and said she was a "hostage" in her home

title: Illegal Entry, Banking Fraud: How Meghalaya Police Busted Infiltration Racket
content: The investigation began on February 14 when the Meghalaya police received intelligence inputs about a group of suspected Bangladeshi nationals travelling from Guwahati to Shillong.

title: Updates: Pope Francis, Leader Of Roman Catholics, Dies At 88 On Easter
content: Pope Francis Death News: Pope Francis, the leader of 1.4 billion Catholics in the world, has died today at 88 after battling various ailments for some time, the Vatican News announced.

title: "We Don't Deserve Good Things": Redditor After Train Travel In India
content: A frustrated railway passenger has slammed fellow Indian travellers for their lack of civic sense. In a scathing Reddit post, the passenger, who was aboard a 3AC coach, recounted his journey.

title: Ex Top Cop's Wife Was Schizophrenic, Would Barge Into Other Homes: Sources
content: Former Karnataka police chief Om Prakash suffered a head injury a few months back after his wife Pallavi hit him with a stone, the investigation into the retired officer's grisly murder has revealed.

title: "A Guru": Joe Rogan Takes A Dig At Katy Perry Over 11-Minute Space Flight
content: American podcaster Joe Rogan is the latest to take potshots at popstar Katy Perry, who was part of the Blue Origin space flight mission's all-female crew.

title: When Pope Francis Apologised To Canada's Indigenous Peoples
content: Pope Francis died on Easter Mondayat his residence in Casa Santa Marta, the Vatican confirmed. The 88-year-old was battling multiple ailments.

title: Pope Francis, Leader Of 1.4 Billion Catholics, Dies At 88 On Easter Monday
content: Pope Francis has died at the age of 88 after a prolonged illness, the Vatican announced on Monday. The pontiff, who was the first Latin American leader of the Roman Catholic Church, became pope in 2013 after his predecessor, Benedict XVI, resigned.

title: When Pope Francis Signed Havana Declaration, Ending Catholic-Orthodox Feud
content: Pope Francis, the first Latin American leader of the Roman Catholic Church, died on Monday after a prolonged illness. He was 88.

title: Indians Battle Respiratory Issues, Skin Rashes In World's Most Polluted Town
content: Two-year-old Sumaiya Ansari, a resident of India's Byrnihat town which is ranked the world's most polluted metropolitan area by Swiss Group IQAir, was battling breathing problems for several days before she was hospitalised in March and given oxygen.

title: "Who Am I To Judge Him": Key Quotes From Pope Francis' Papacy
content: Pope Francis Death News: Pope Francis has died at the age of 88 after a prolonged illness, the Vatican announced on Monday.

title: From Simplicity To Support For LGBTQ: Key Takeaways From Pope Francis' Life
content: Jorge Mario Bergoglio was born Dec. 17, 1936, to Italian immigrants in Buenos Aires, Argentina, the eldest of five children.

title: 'My Father Went To Sister's House Due To Mother's Threats': Ex-Top Cop's Son
content: Facing threats to his life from his wife, Karnataka police chief Om Prakash was staying at his sister's home, it has emerged. But just a few days before he was murdered allegedly by his wife Pallavi, his daughter Kruthi had coaxed him to return.

title: "Pope Francis' Affection For Indians Will Always Be Cherished": PM Modi
content: Condoling the death of Pope Francis, Prime Minister Narendra Modi has said that the Catholic priest's affection for the people of India will always be cherished.

title: Pope Francis Dies: "The Peoples Pope" And His Stunning Gestures
content: Dubbed "the people's Pope", the Argentine pontiff loved being among his flock and was popular with the faithful, though he faced bitter opposition from traditionalists within the Church.

title: Pope Francis' Last Appearance On Easter, Calls For "Renewed Hope For Peace"
content: Pope Francis, who was the first Latin American leader of the Roman Catholic Church, became pope in 2013 after his predecessor, Benedict XVI, resigned.

title: How the Cavs, Celtics, Knicks and Pacers won Game 1 -- and what's next for each series
content: the 2025 playoffs are in full swing, and our insiders have you covered for every game in the march to the finals . the Eastern Conference's top two teams began their postseason runs on Sunday . despite the Cleveland Cavaliers and the defending champion Boston Celtics notching wins, neither was as easy as the final score suggested .

title: Golden State's clutch win and OKC's big statement put the West on notice
content: the 2024-25 playoffs are underway, and there are lessons to take from the weekend's results . the no. 1 seed Oklahoma City Thunder clobber the 8-seed Memphis Grizzlies by 51 points for the fifth-largest margin of victory in NBA postseason history .

title: Fredricson the only bright spot on another dismal day for Man United
content: despite a 1-0 defeat to Wolves, the premier league has become little more than an after-thought for Manchester United . despite the grueling 120 minutes against Lyon on friday, amorim handed a first senior appearance against Wolves to young defender Tyler Fredricson . the 20-year-old's injuries and rotation presented him with an unexpected opportunity .

title: Stanley Cup playoffs first-round guide: Best bets and Conn Smythe predictions
content: the 2025 Stanley Cup playoffs begin on saturday with 16 teams looking to etch their name onto Lord Stanley's Cup . the Winnipeg Jets look to make their first Stanley Cup Final appearance . they will face the los Angeles Kings for the fourth straight postseason .

title: European soccer review: Real Madrid still in title race, plus much more
content: the laLiga title race is nearly officially over, but the race for european places is as competitive as ever . in the Bundesliga, Germany's last remaining clubs were knocked out of european competition, but Bayern Munich returned to some sense of normalcy by dismantling a relative minnow .

title: Odisha Man Shoots Self To Blame It On Family Of Girl Who Accused Him Of Rape, Arrested
content: a man was recently released from jail after he secured bail in the rape case, police say . he lodged a complaint in the early hours of the day, alleging that two persons related to the raped survivor had shot him . the gun supplier was present at the spot at the time of the firing, and following it, he left with the firearm .
